languages.text: По мере продвижения к мостику стоит следить за ситуацией у союзников и по возможности помогать им.
As the Lord Captain makes {rt_mf|his|her} way to the enemy bridge, it would be best to keep an eye on {rt_mf|his|her} allies' status and assist them whenever possible.
languages.original_text: По мере продвижения к мостику стоит следить за ситуацией у союзников и по возможности помогать им.

traits.locale_text: As the Lord Captain makes {mf|his|her} way to the enemy bridge, it would be best to keep an eye on {mf|his|her} allies' status and assist them whenever possible.

As the Lord Captain makes {rt_mf|his|her} way to the enemy bridge, it would be best to keep an eye on {rt_mf|his|her} allies' status and assist them whenever possible.

languages.text: Während sich der Lord Captain einen Weg zur feindlichen Brücke bahnt, wäre es gut, den Status {rt_mf|seiner|ihrer} Verbündeten bestmöglich im Auge zu behalten.
languages.original_text: As the Lord Captain makes {rt_mf|his|her} way to the enemy bridge, it would be best to keep an eye on {rt_mf|his|her} allies' status and assist them whenever possible.

traits.locale_text: Während sich der Lord Captain einen Weg zur feindlichen Brücke bahnt, wäre es gut, den Status {mf|seiner|ihrer} Verbündeten bestmöglich im Auge zu behalten.

languages.text: En chemin vers la passerelle ennemie, {rt_mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ferait bien de veiller sur ses alliés et de les soutenir autant que possible.
languages.original_text: As the Lord Captain makes {rt_mf|his|her} way to the enemy bridge, it would be best to keep an eye on {rt_mf|his|her} allies' status and assist them whenever possible.

traits.locale_text: En chemin vers la passerelle ennemie, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ferait bien de veiller sur ses alliés et de les soutenir autant que possible.

languages.text: 行商浪人在前往敌方舰桥途中，最好能时刻留意盟友的状态，在力所能及的范围内提供协助。
languages.original_text: As the Lord Captain makes {rt_mf|his|her} way to the enemy bridge, it would be best to keep an eye on {rt_mf|his|her} allies' status and assist them whenever possible.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人在前往敌方舰桥途中，最好能时刻留意盟友的状态，在力所能及的范围内提供协助。

languages.text: Conforme {rt_mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se dirige al puente de la nave enemiga, será buena idea que vigile el estado de sus aliados y les proporcione toda la ayuda que pueda.
languages.original_text: As the Lord Captain makes {rt_mf|his|her} way to the enemy bridge, it would be best to keep an eye on {rt_mf|his|her} allies' status and assist them whenever possible.

traits.locale_text: Conforme {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se dirige al puente de la nave enemiga, será buena idea que vigile el estado de sus aliados y les proporcione toda la ayuda que pueda.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンが敵のブリッジに向かう際、味方の状況に目を配り、可能な限り支援するのが最善だろう。
languages.original_text: As the Lord Captain makes {rt_mf|his|her} way to the enemy bridge, it would be best to keep an eye on {rt_mf|his|her} allies' status and assist them whenever possible.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンが敵のブリッジに向かう際、味方の状況に目を配り、可能な限り支援するのが最善だろう。

languages.text: Lord Kaptan düşman köprüsüne doğru ilerlerken müttefiklerinin durumunu takip etmek ve mümkün olduğunca onlara yardımcı olmak en iyisi olacaktır.
languages.original_text: As the Lord Captain makes {rt_mf|his|her} way to the enemy bridge, it would be best to keep an eye on {rt_mf|his|her} allies' status and assist them whenever possible.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan düşman köprüsüne doğru ilerlerken müttefiklerinin durumunu takip etmek ve mümkün olduğunca onlara yardımcı olmak en iyisi olacaktır.
